info.task: navigate backwards out of checkbox group
info.title: Navigate backwards out of a checkbox group in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusAfterFirstCheckbox
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link after the first checkbox
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on a link after the first checkbox
testPageDocument.querySelector('#afterlink').focus();

user: Navigate backwards out of the checkbox group.
instructions.raw: Navigate backwards out of the checkbox group.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
